declarations.name: useIsMobile
declarations.description: A React hook that determines if the current viewport width is less than the mobile breakpoint (768px). Returns true if the viewport is considered mobile, otherwise false.

parameters.description: This hook does not accept any parameters.

returns.description: Returns true if the viewport width is less than 768px, otherwise false.

declarations.implementationNotes: Uses window.matchMedia to listen for viewport width changes and updates state accordingly. The hook returns a boolean indicating if the device is mobile-sized.
